net.sf.mmm.search.indexer.api.strategy

Interface SearchIndexerUpdateStrategyManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSearchIndexerUpdateStrategyManager, DefaultSearchIndexerUpdateStrategyManager, SearchIndexerUpdateStrategyManagerImpl

    @ComponentSpecification
public interface SearchIndexerUpdateStrategyManager
    This is the interface for the component used to get the proper SearchIndexerUpdateStrategy.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SearchIndexerUpdateStrategy getStrategy(SearchIndexerSource source)
      This method will create the SearchIndexerUpdateStrategy for the given source.

    • Method Detail

      • getStrategy

        SearchIndexerUpdateStrategy getStrategy(SearchIndexerSource source)
        This method will create the SearchIndexerUpdateStrategy for the given source.
        Parameters:
        source - is the SearchIndexerSource to index (incremental) according to its update-strategy.
        Returns:
        the according SearchIndexerUpdateStrategy.
